body:
Not 100%, but it's happening frequently enough to block merges

Unclear if related to #18913. #18635 makes me highly suspicious - looks like the failures started right around when it was merged.

@kubernetes/goog-testing @k8s-oncall @wojtek-t @timothysc @mikedanese

title: TestWatchEtcdError fairly consistently timing out
